DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gain information on safety and efficacy from Korean patients who starting Ventavis treatment by observational method.
DOC.brief_title: Hypertension Study of VentavisÂ® Inhalation Therapy in the Treatment of Patients With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (VENIS)
DOC.criteria: The treating physician has chosen Ventavis as a suitable treatment for the patient Patient with PH and classified as NYHA functional class III or IV and WHO group 1 Any condition that prevents participation in the study, including pregnancy and other contraindications for Ventavis treatment (as listed in the current Ventavis patient package insert).
